metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Shares the quirky, fast-paced, and often absurd humor of shows like 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Similar to 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso,' it blends heartwarming moments with clever, meta-humor and ensemble cast dynamics.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Offers a positive and humorous outlook, like 'Ted Lasso', with a touch of the absurd found in 'The Simpsons'.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Combines comedy with philosophical themes, similar to the intellectual humor of 'Rick and Morty' and the optimistic tone of 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Deadpan humor and absurd situations, reminiscent of 'It's Always Sunny' and 'Rick and Morty', but with a supernatural twist.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: Darkly comedic and action-packed superhero series that subverts genre tropes, similar to 'One-Punch Man' but with a more cynical edge.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: Animated superhero series with intense action, humor, and surprising emotional depth, appealing to fans of 'One-Punch Man' and 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: Visually stunning animated series with a compelling story and mature themes, similar to the quality animation and sci-fi elements of 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Mystery thriller with a unique premise and unsettling atmosphere, akin to the suspense of 'Stranger Things' and 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Complex and mind-bending sci-fi mystery with elements of time travel, fitting for fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Espionage thriller with a sci-fi twist involving parallel universes, appealing to those who enjoyed the mystery and suspense of 'The Night Manager' and the sci-fi aspects of 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Altered Carbon
metas.description: Cyberpunk series with a gritty atmosphere, action, and philosophical themes, similar to 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Dark comedy with surreal and thought-provoking scenarios, reminiscent of 'Rick and Morty' and 'Love, Death & Robots' with a touch of 'Scrubs' absurdist humor.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Quirky and mind-bending detective series with science fiction and comedic elements, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Happy!
metas.description: Darkly comedic and violent series with a unique premise and unexpected humor, similar to the edginess of 'Brassic' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Combines comedy with sci-fi and romantic elements, reminiscent of 'Futurama' and 'Ted Lasso' with a thought-provoking premise.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Anthology series exploring dark and unsettling themes related to technology and society, similar to 'Love, Death & Robots' but with a more grounded approach.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern take on the classic detective with intricate mysteries and compelling characters, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: Dark and gritty crime drama with a complex and morally ambiguous detective, similar to the darker elements of 'The Night Manager' and 'Brassic'.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: Intense police procedural focused on corruption within the police force, appealing to fans of crime dramas like 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Broadchurch
metas.description: Gripping crime drama with a focus on the emotional impact of a crime on a small community, similar to the suspense of 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: British sitcom with cringe humor and relatable characters, similar to the awkward humor of 'It's Always Sunny' and the British sensibilities of 'Brassic'.

metas.name: Spaced
metas.description: Cult classic sitcom with geeky humor, surreal moments, and a fast-paced style, appealing to fans of 'Scrubs' and 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Taskmaster
metas.description: British comedy panel show with absurd tasks and hilarious interactions, similar to the spontaneous humor of 'It's Always Sunny' and 'Brassic'.

metas.name: Derry Girls
metas.description: Comedy about teenagers growing up in Northern Ireland during the Troubles, blending humor with historical context, appealing to fans of 'Brassic' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Extraordinary
metas.description: Comedy about a young woman navigating life in a world where everyone develops superpowers, except her, reminiscent of 'One-Punch Man' but with a more grounded, relatable feel.

metas.name: Resident Alien
metas.description: A comedic mystery show about an alien posing as a small-town doctor, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Scrubs' with its quirky humor and sci-fi elements.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: A woman is caught in a time loop, reliving the same night over and over again, a dark comedy series with sci-fi and mystery elements, similar to 'Rick and Morty' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Beef
metas.description: Dark comedy about two strangers who get into a road rage incident that escalates into a full-blown feud. Its dark humor and complex characters align with 'Brassic' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Gritty drama focused on a cybersecurity engineer and hacker. It has a dark tone like 'The Night Manager', and it is mystery-driven like 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Andor
metas.description: A spy thriller and action show set in the Star Wars universe that is complex and mystery-driven, similar to 'Fallout' and 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: A suspenseful and mysterious drama about a company that surgically divides employees' memories between their work and personal lives. It has sci-fi elements, similar to 'Stranger Things' and 'Love, Death, & Robots'.

metas.name: The Leftovers
metas.description: A drama about the aftereffects of a global event in which 2% of the world's population suddenly vanishes. It has mystery elements similar to 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Midnight Mass
metas.description: A horror mystery series set on an isolated island community that experiences miraculous events and frightening omens after the arrival of a charismatic priest. It has mystery and fantasy, similar to 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Bodies
metas.description: A British crime show where four detectives in four different time periods discover the body of the same murder victim. Its mystery and crime-solving appeal to fans of 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: A crime thriller where FBI agents interview serial killers to understand their psychology and solve ongoing cases, satisfying for fans of 'HIS & HERS' and 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Black Sails
metas.description: A historical adventure drama and prequel to Treasure Island set in the Golden Age of Piracy. Its adventure and action will appeal to fans of 'Fallout'.

A German mystery thriller series about a group of European migrants traveling to New York who encounter another migrant ship adrift at sea. It has sci-fi mystery like 'Stranger Things' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Devs
metas.description: A suspenseful and cerebral sci-fi series about a software engineer investigating the secret development division of her employer. It has the tech and sci-fi aspect of 'Love, Death, & Robots'.

metas.name: Undone
metas.description: An animated comedy-drama series about a woman who develops the ability to manipulate time after a car accident. Its animation and sci-fi make it similar to 'Love, Death, & Robots' and 'Rick and Morty'.
